text: <a href="../1-Timothy-2-1/" title="1 Timothy 2:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, *and* giving of thanks, be made for all men;

<a href="../1-Timothy-2-2/" title="1 Timothy 2:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 For kings, and *for* all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-3/" title="1 Timothy 2:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 For this *is* good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-4/" title="1 Timothy 2:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-5/" title="1 Timothy 2:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 For *there is* one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-6/" title="1 Timothy 2:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.

<a href="../1-Timothy-2-7/" title="1 Timothy 2:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, *and* lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-8/" title="1 Timothy 2:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

<a href="../1-Timothy-2-9/" title="1 Timothy 2:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-10/" title="1 Timothy 2:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-11/" title="1 Timothy 2:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-12/" title="1 Timothy 2:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-13/" title="1 Timothy 2:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
<a href="../1-Timothy-2-14/" title="1 Timothy 2:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.

<a href="../1-Timothy-2-15/" title="1 Timothy 2:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
